attributes.additional_details: The ban of combustion cars causes issues for people that cannot afford to buy electric cars aswell as it does not help change the environment building electric cars damages the planet more by getting the materials to build them. Electric cars are also not safe to use when they easily set fire and can kill the vehicle technicians that have to work on them!
attributes.background: Delay the ban of combustion engines or no ban on engines at all

rejection.details: The Government recently announced that it was delaying the ban on new diesel and petrol cars from 2030 to 2035. If you would like the ban to be further delayed you could start a new petition saying when you want the ban to be delayed until.
